title: Action settings
info: The content of the action is Actions list
hard_button_info: Back key, Search key, volume key, Camera key, and Menu key settings
soft_button_info: Tab bar, URL bar, custom bar settings
double_swipe_info:
Setting of swipe without releasing after double tap
You can zoom even if it is disabled
Also, if you set the vertical direction, you can not use zoom in that direction
quick_info:
Up to 3 quick control settings
Level 1, level 2, level 3 from inside
long_tap_info: Browser setting of Link, Images, Image links, and Others
